https://commission.europa.eu/energy-clim.title: Ecodesign for Sustainable Products Regulation
https://commission.europa.eu/energy-clim.info: ESPR effective July 2024, requires products to be durable, reusable, repairable, recyclable. Introduces Digital Product Passport and bans destruction of unsold textiles/footwear. Part of EU Green Deal.

https://www.digitalcommerce360.com/2023/.info: 79.6% of consumers willing to wait at least one day for sustainable shipping, 69% say sustainable shipping influences purchases, 76% willing to pay 5% extra for sustainable delivery. Shows strong consumer commitment to eco-friendly delivery options.

https://www.winssolutions.org/how-sustai.info: Dropshipping creates 30% more packaging waste than traditional retail, high carbon footprint from long-distance shipping, return rates up to 25%. Provides strategies for eco-friendly suppliers, local sourcing, and sustainable packaging solutions.

https://www.shopify.com/blog/aliexpress-.title: AliExpress vs. Alibaba: How Do They Compare? (2025)
https://www.shopify.com/blog/aliexpress-.info: Comprehensive comparison between AliExpress and Alibaba for dropshipping, including pricing models, shipping times, supplier verification methods, and platform-specific advantages/disadvantages. Key insights: AliExpress is B2C with no MOQ requirements, fixed pricing, 1-50 day shipping; Alibaba is B2B with MOQ requirements, negotiable pricing, 5-40 day shipping.
